about_the_game:
Voxel Mage: Siege is a fast-paced, action-packed party game!
Equip different magical gloves to gain access to powerful abilities.
Defend your voxel base and destroy your enemy's!

Voxel Destruction



At the heart of Voxel Mage is voxels! Voxel Mage teams have a crystal, which grants the ability to summon a voxel structure to defend. In-game voxel editor for custom structures coming soon!

The Early Access version of the game current features the Castle Defense and Castle Versus game modes.

In Castle Defense, players in VR will square off against the onslaught of flying siege enemies, controlled by AI or players on mobile devices, that will try and destroy your structure. Survive until the timer runs out to win!

In Castle Versus, players in VR join a team with flying siege units, controlled by AI or players on mobile, and try and destroy the enemy base. The first to destroy their enemy is the winner!

Punch-Based Abilities




Many of the gloves are activated by your body movements. When you punch forward, you may summon a seeking projectile, or even a dragon's head to bite close range enemies!

There are 4 ability gloves currently in the game;

Magic Missile Punch - This blue and gold glove will send fiery projectiles after whatever you're looking at! Just punch to activate the magic ability and do some damage!

Dragonhead Fist Glove - This martial looking glove grants access to a magical dragon punch attack that sends an ethereal fire dragon out to consume your enemies in close range.

Slingshot Gauntlet - This strange beast's magic has been channeled into a glove that activates a powerful projectile attack by performing a sling attack with your other hand.

Insect Glaive Gauntlet - This flying insect glove will pull you in the direction you're aiming, letting you fly around the area and skewer enemies who get to close with a punch attack.

Cross-Platform Multiplayer



Voxel Mage is fun on its own, but its even more fun with others!
Join a public lobby and play against random people online or join specific public or private lobbies with a room code.

Players in VR can play as a mage. Players on mobile get to control dragons and other physics-based siege units.

Mobile app coming soon!

Competent AI



The enemies in Voxel Mage are many and persistent! Defending your structure against these foes might not be as easy as you think!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or Greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Valve Index, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Voxel Mage is a cross-platform, multiplayer, voxel destruction party game! Grab some friends, play against others online, or enjoy offline matches against AI in this game of magic mayhem that packs a serious punch!
